snippet: Officials from the Hualapai Tribe gathered Tuesday for a ceremonial grand opening of a road that had been a major headache for tourists headed to the Grand Canyon Skywalk....

headline.print_headline: New Road Makes Trip to Grand Canyon Skywalk Faster
headline.main: New Road Makes Trip to Grand Canyon Skywalk Faster

lead_paragraph: Officials from the Hualapai Tribe gathered Tuesday for a ceremonial grand opening of a road that had been a major headache for tourists headed to the Grand Canyon Skywalk.
